description:
Socket an Artifact's [slot_trait] Trait Slot with this item to gain this trait:\n\nCall of the Aspect:
This creature has an independent 12% chance to dodge attacks for each different type of {RACE_Aspect} fighting on your side. When it does, your {RACE_Aspect}s gain 20% {STAT_attack}, {STAT_intelligence}, {STAT_defense}, and {STAT_speed}.
name: Seasons Figment
